title: News24.com | ANALYSIS | South Africa needs to end the lockdown: here’s a blueprint for its replacement
description: Our view is that a protracted lockdown wonât necessarily have the effect of ridding the country of the virus, but it will result in unacceptably high health and economic consequences.
content: The public debate on strategies to tackle Covid-19 often unhelpfully positions health and economic considerations in a diametric fashion – as trade-offs. In fact, economic policy has health consequences. And health policy has economic consequences. The two ne… [+8712 chars]
